Posts.Content: Jan 15, 2009 05:41AM lilyj wrote: Wow!  I remember seeing this on TV years ago, and it affected me that night.  But, nothing as much as today.  What an inspiration!!!  Exactly what I needed to see at this time.  Awesome!  Thank you!  I'm going to send it around, too. My hair has grown back and my strength is back.  Surgeries are behind me... it's all good!  It's my turn to help all those out there dealing with this nightmare.  Lilyj
Posts.Title: ======= Melissa Etheridge Tribute @ Grammy's BALD! ======== Longislandmoms lilyj
